name: Nineteen (kiran)
description: Nineteen is an auto-biographical game I created, detailing vignettes from my life. Nineteen is the first part in the series, 'Ten' which I hope to create through Twine. I have lived through abuse, poverty, and violence I never thought I would recover from. Donations I receive from 'Nineteen' will help me to get back on my feet after being laid off on June 27, 2014. Thank you for your support.
